plugin.name: chatgpt-research
plugin.description: AI-powered web research and content analysis using ChatGPT with Google Search
plugin.context: Use for researching topics, analyzing information, searching the web, and answering questions that require current information or web search. IMPORTANT: research_topic already provides comprehensive, detailed output - do NOT use summarize_content after research_topic as it will reduce quality. Use summarize_content ONLY for condensing existing external content, not for research results.

research_topic.description: Research a topic using web search and AI analysis - produces comprehensive, ready-to-use output
research_topic.usage_context: When user wants to research a topic, find current information, or get comprehensive analysis of a subject using web search and AI. The output is already detailed and complete - do NOT summarize it further.

topic.description: The topic, question, or subject to research. Can be a keyword, phrase, or detailed question.

depth.description: Research depth: quick (3 sources), standard (5 sources), comprehensive (8 sources), deep_dive (10 sources)

focus.description: Research focus: general (all sources), recent (latest news), technical (technical docs), academic (scholarly), news (current events)

output_format.description: Output format: summary (brief ~200 words), detailed (comprehensive 400-600 words), bullet_points (structured points), report (formal 500-800 words)

max_length.description: Maximum length of the response in characters (default 5000 for quality detailed output)

topic_length.message: Topic description cannot exceed 500 characters. Please summarize your research request.

comprehensive_research.message: Comprehensive research may take longer and use more tokens. Continue?

output_guidance.success_message: Research completed successfully with {source_count} sources analyzed

common_errors.api_key_missing: Google Search API key is not configured. Please contact support to enable web research.
common_errors.rate_limit_exceeded: Research rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.no_results_found: No relevant information found for this topic. Try different keywords or a broader search.
common_errors.api_error: Web search API encountered an error. Please try again or contact support.
common_errors.timeout: Research request timed out. Try a simpler query or quick depth setting.

summarize_content.description: Summarize provided content using AI - for EXISTING external content only
summarize_content.usage_context: When user wants to summarize existing content, text, articles, or documents without web search. Do NOT use this to summarize results from research_topic - those are already optimized.

content.description: The content to summarize (text, article, document)

length.description: Summary length: brief (1-2 sentences), standard (1 paragraph), detailed (multiple paragraphs)

focus_on.description: Specific aspects or keywords to focus on in the summary

content_length.message: Content cannot exceed 50,000 characters. Please provide a shorter text.

common_errors.content_too_short: Content is too short to summarize meaningfully. Minimum 50 characters required.
common_errors.api_error: AI summarization failed. Please try again or contact support.
common_errors.timeout: Summarization timed out. Try summarizing a shorter text.

answer_question.description: Answer questions using AI with optional web research
answer_question.usage_context: When user asks a question that may require current information, facts, or analysis

use_web_search.description: Whether to use web search for current information

detail_level.description: Level of detail in the answer

include_sources.description: Include source citations in the answer

common_errors.unclear_question: The question is unclear or too vague. Please provide more context.
common_errors.no_information: Unable to find reliable information to answer this question.
common_errors.api_error: AI service encountered an error. Please try rephrasing your question.
common_errors.timeout: Question answering timed out. Try a simpler question.
